short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a teaching of Sri Shirdi Sai Baba from the book Sri Sai Satcharitra written by Shri Hemadpant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sri Sai Baba of Shirdi has shared many valuable lessons, many of which are captured in the book Sri Sai Satcharitra written by Shri Hemadpant.

This extension retrieves one of Baba's quotes and displays it. Every time you click on the plugin, you will see a new quote.
